entry.title: First Time To Read All Contents of Bible
entry.content:
Tonight, I read the Malachi, the last one in Old Testament.

Since September 2013, I started to read Bible. And I finshed reading all content of Holy Bible.

Write this post to remember this day.

entry.title: Church Meeting and Baptsim
entry.content:
Yesterday is a Saturday, we attended church meeting. The teacher is from Taian, the subject is about Faith, Heresy, Her Witness and Fundamentals.

I was attracted with this. After I finished my procedures of graduation, I stayed in the church to listen the teaching.

And the teaching stoped at about 5:00 pm, then I went to be baptized.

This is a really rare chance to be baptized. Since I came to CUMT Fellowship, I found I was changed, and a few month ago, I found I wanted to be baptized. And this is the last chance to be baptized before graduation.

Really thanks God. Because he gave me this changce.

About baptsim. There are a lot of words in Bible.

He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved; but he that believeth not shall be damned. --Mark 16:16

Therefore if any man be in Christ, he is a new creature: old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new. --Corinthians 5:17

And there is a witness about Philip and an eunuch.

The reason that I want to be baptized is only one, I want to be saved.

entry.title: Graduate
entry.content:
Yesterday, brothers and sisters got together to learn God’s words and say goodbye to graduates, like me.

I came to the fellowship in September 2013, and now I will leave.

And I find a difference between I came and I left, before I came to the fellowship, I had a heart made up of stone, but now I feel my heart is made up of flesh. What or who gave me this difference, I thing is God’s words, it is Bible, it is Spirit.

I always thought I would not be sad when I graduate. But I find I am wrong, now. Because I feel sadness.

Before noon, Mrs Zhang call me to ask me about how to get water. And I just came to the fellowship. I arrived at about 12:30, and there are many elders and classmates, I felt sleepy, cause I had a habit to sleep at noon.

I did not know how to say. So I just write it sorted by the time.

I bought steamed breads and condiments.

We sang songs to admire and praise God.

Pastor Lu gave us a lesson about how to keep the faith after graduatation in this guilty World.

A presentation of graduates, and I am the first, I did not prepare fot it.

Receiving the gifts and elders gave us a blessing and lesson(Pastor Yao and Aunt Diao and so on).

Cells' shows, and I paly a harmonica show and sang it /simple gift/.

We lined in 2 circles and said goodbye.

We ate. There are really many people this time. Maybe 40-50 people.

I really don't know how to describe this day, what I can do is just write the title and keep the memory in my mind.

Thanks God!

And he answering said, Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy strength, and with all thy mind; and thy neighbour as thyself. —Luke 10:27

entry.title: Jesus knows Your pain
entry.content:
These 2 days, I just do one thing. It is writing my paper and instruction to the coal preparation plant I designed.

But this is one thing very bad , it is the college tell me to submit the instruction/paper/translation in may 29. But the noticed is opened at may 27.

And what I prayed to say Jesus is help me to give me strength and time to write the instuction. Cause I have not writen the instruction.

And this notice made me unhappy.

Really unhappy.

But I gave this burden to Jesus, and search the help from Jesus.

I wake up at May 28, and I just write the words to the instruction.

I did not finished it by the night. And I slept at about 23 pm.

There is another thing make me unhappy. Cause I need to take physical examination at May 2y the same day as the submitting day.

These 2 days, I ate, I slept, I talked, I joined to Bible Study Group, But I was unhappy.

Until a little time later, I check my instruction and paper and so on with the check-paper too to verify whether my artcile had high repetition rate.

I got 10 percents. And the college’s reqiurement is 20 percents.

Really thanks God.

Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name: ask, and ye shall receive, that your joy may be full.   --John 16;24

Jesus Really felt my pain and helped me. What love he gave!

entry.title: Ordination-The First Time I joined
entry.content:
In May 21, the day of 521, just like the word ‘I love you’ in Chinese.

And in the morning, I went to Mineral Research Center to visit the Tan to check my drawing of the Coal Preparation Plant. And she and Mr Peng and others give a lot of advice and show some mistakes. So I need to take much time to redraw it.

And after noon. There is a report in college, I went to join it. Professor Zeng Hongbo make this report about some reseach in University of Alberta. He is less than 30, but already was a professor.

After te report, I found the time is 4 pm, and Miss Zhang send me a message about the Ordination. And I called Ma. She told me she will went back to dormitory firstly. And I think I need too. But when I came to the door of my dormitory, I found it is 4:20. We need to arrive North Gate before 4:40-50.

So I decided to buy a bottole of water and just go north. But Ma did not show.

And I sent a message to ask her where she is. She was in the dormitory and she tell me wait for her. Though I already was on the car to the North Gate, I off the car.

Some minutes later. She came, we went to the North and met Uncle Yao.

And we started to go to the XiXiang Church. It is a long distance. And we talked, talked about a lot of things. From now to a long time ago. Maybe when there 2 people who know each other with a long distance, they will talk a lot more than ever and shared their thought. And when we arrived Xi Xiang Church, It is about 6 pm.

And in Xi Xiang, I found we two have a job to hold the plate with presants.

Pator Ma Wenlong, a pator from US give me a talk about of heart and leadship of pator.
